5.50.text: So you thought it was the end of the story.

12.80.text: You thought that one single event that one single moment was enough for him to stand amongst the greats.

21.00.text: Sleep. 'I don't sleep.' You thought that was it.

33.10.text: This is the art where you re-invent yourself.

37.00.text: It's time to get tested, to test your will, your endurance, it's time to test your art, to test your limits.

46.00.text: No weekends, no holidays, no birthdays. Listen to me! No days off!

53.90.text: It's about gaining the competitive edge.

58.20.text: You can't afford to make excuses.

60.30.text: No excuses when you feel pain. And trust me, you will feel it.

67.00.text: And all you wanna do is give up.

68.70.text: And all you wanna do is give in.

71.60.text: When you feel like you've given all you got...

74.80.text: ...you gotta take one more step, you gotta run one more lap, ou gotta throw one more punch.

101.80.text: Do you think he's coming back?

115.50.text: This is your beginning but it doesn't have to be your end.

121.10.text:
You can do nothing without faith!
You are still special.

134.00.text: Behind every fear is the person you want to be.

136.60.text: Fear is self-imposed, mean it doesn't exist.

139.20.text: You create it, you can destroy it.

141.10.text: You face your fears and become the person you want to be.

143.70.text: You run from your fears, your not living. You are alive but you not dig in the freedom.

150.20.text: You are not running the day, the day is running you.

153.70.text: We all fall down in life. The question is:

159.10.text: You don't owe these people any more.

170.00.text: And I've seen now what I would have to become to stop men like him.

174.80.text: If you make yourself more than just a man...

180.20.text: ...if you devote yourself to an ideal...

188.40.text: then you become something else entirely.

194.40.text: You go after it and you give it all you have.

196.30.text: If you lose it, at least you tried, man!

198.90.text: 'I failed' is ten times more overman than someone said 'what if ?'

202.70.text:
Cos 'what if ?' Never went to the arena! 
That's called courage.

206.30.text: Now that's the stuff leaders should be made of.

209.30.text: You think something's wrong maybe it's time to stop. No it's time to move free and further!

212.20.text: Mentally you must believed before you physically started.

216.40.text: I choose to rise, not fall!

218.00.text: I choose to live, not die!

222.20.text: Not tomorrow, not next week, but right now, right here.

230.00.text: I will never go home, not without giving everything I have got!

282.50.text: All you need now is little imagination.

284.60.text: Will you belive it or not,

287.80.text: your imagination is preview of your lifetime coming attractions.

291.50.text: If you can't imagine what it's gonna be,

294.25.text: don't ever expect physically looking into the mirror and see it.
